officialTitle: Use of Liposomal Bupivacaine for Postoperative Pain Management After Arthroscopic Rotator Cuff Repair
inclusionCriteria:
* Adult patients up to age 65 years, undergoing elective, ambulatory, arthroscopic rotator cuff repair.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Pregnancy, coagulopathy, allergy to bupivacaine, renal failure, hepatic insufficiency, and/or inappropriate candidate for usual therapy (specifically, if unable to receive the usual preoperative interscalene nerve block: preexisting nerve injury on side of surgery, refusal of nerve block, infection at site of nerve block).
